verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, when he fled <S%H1272><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> Absalom <S%H53><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>. LORD <S%H3068><s%>, how are they increased <S%H7231><s%> that trouble <S%H6862><s%> me! many <S%H7227><s%> are they that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against me.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there be which say <S%H559><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%>, There is no help <S%H3444><s%> for him in God <S%H430><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
But thou, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, art a shield <S%H4043><s%> for me; my glory <S%H3519><s%>, and the lifter up <S%H7311><s%> of mine head <S%H7218><s%>. for: or, about
I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
I laid me down <S%H7901><s%> and slept <S%H3462><s%>; I awaked <S%H6974><s%>; for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sustained <S%H5564><s%> me.
I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%>, that have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against me round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>; save <S%H3467><s%> me, O my God <S%H430><s%>: for thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%> all mine enemies <S%H341><s%> upon the cheek bone <S%H3895><s%>; thou hast broken <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the ungodly <S%H7563><s%>.
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongeth unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: thy blessing <S%H1293><s%> is upon thy people <S%H5971><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
